result.markdown: --- title: The future of Commercial Robots description: | A brief review of the State-of-the-art of commercial robots and future ones. date: 2024-12-18 author: - name: Sergio Jácobo-zavaleta image: s30_futureRobots.png image-alt: | An image of a humanoid robot adapted from ghost in the shell --- ::: {.cell} ::: ` slides`{=html} ` materials`{=html} ## Overview The following topics were covered: - State-of-the-art of Commercial Robots - Current state of Commercial Robots - Current potential Challenges - 5-year Horizon (2029) - 1. Healthcare and Assistive Robots - 2. Manufacturing and Industrial Robots - Examples - 10-year Horizon (2034) - 20-year Horizon (2054) ## Event details **Event:** Course: Intelligent and Autonomous Robots | Master in Robotics and Automation **Date:** 12th December, 2024 **Time:** 19:00 **Location:** Universidad Carlos III de Madrid ## Slides Keyboard shortcuts for slideshow (once you've clicked inside it): - Use ← and → to navigate through the slides - Use o for an overview of all slides - Use ? for an overview more keyboard shortcuts - Click the hamburger menu in the bottom left corner of the slide deck for more options - f to toggle full screen doesn't work from this page. Go to [slides](https://ellakaye.github.io/2024-07-31-diverse/) and use that shortcut from there instead
